Editors.about: All editors ( that have catch my interest ). Classified by type EDITOR/ and expectation for other game EDTLOVE/( GOOD, AVG, LOW ), comment tag is INFO

FPS to be done.about: To choose the next FPS to do !

Turn Based to be done.about: To choose the next turn based to do !

Others RPG to be done.about: To choose the next RPG ( except classical FPS or turn based ) to do ! Can be arcade, card game, hack n slash...

Romance VN to be done.about: To choose the next Romance VN to be done ( romance is part of the game and not just for scening purpose )

VN No Story set.about: Missing story in a VN will lead to be not selected for next game

Strong story to be done.about: To choose the next strong story to read

Sequel to be done.about: A suite or an after story of a game

DEV - VNAs.about: All VNA games followed currently in development not already tested

DEV - VNAs Tested.about: All VNA games followed currently in development (episodic) tested and not in explicit waiting later state

DEV - VNAs Tested Update Available.about: All VNA games followed currently in development (episodic) with an update available ( not completion, episodic playing  )

DEV - VNAs Tested Wait Update.about: All VNA games followed currently in development (episodic) waiting for an update ( not completion, episodic playing  )

DEV - VNAs Wait Completed.about: All VN games available but where an extension / update is in development

VNAs - Extension planned.about: All VNA games followed currently in development (episodic) in waiting to be complete ( or to be check really later )

VNAs - Next (episodic).about: VNAs in development to be done and not already played ( started, standby, tested, done )

VNAs - Next Complete.about: VNAs available (game complete) to be done and not already played ( started, standby, tested, done )

VNAs - in standby.about: VNAs available already started, not in progress but not finished ( standby, alternative route, sequel, just launch once, ... )

VNAs - Alt Path.about: VNAs available already started, done once but alternative route available

VNAs - Playing.about: VNAs available - play though in progress

VNAs - Done.about: VNAs done (at least 30% of the game before stopping)

DEV - VNs.about: Followed VNs in development ( by expectation: most expected and then 1, 2, 3 or TO_BE_SET )

VNs - in standby.about: VNs available already started, not in progress but not finished ( standby, sequel, just launch once, ... )

VNs - Alt Path.about: VNAs available already started, done once but alternative route available

VNs - Playing.about: VNs available - play though in progress

My wish list - VNs.about: VN Wish listed ( ``PLATFORM/Wish`` ) for Available games ( Most expected and then 1 to undefined )

VNs - Extension planned.about: All VN games available but where an extension / update is in development

RPGs - Next (Standby).about: RPGs already played but in standby ( to be restarted ... or not that is the question )

My wish list - RPGs.about: Wished RPGs ( available or in development )

Coop - Playing.about: Coop game in progress with Willy

Other Next Game.about: game not fitting previous types and available to play ( not VN or RPG or Coop ) - Also include not classified games because without proper tagging , it's others

Others - Next (Standby).about: game not fitting previous types and started but in standby ( not VN or RPG or Coop ) - Also include not classified games because without proper tagging , it's others

Other Playing Game.about: game not fitting previous types and in progress ( not VN or RPG or Coop )

My wish list - Others.about: game not fitting previous types and wished ( not VN or RPG or Coop )

KickStarted.about: kickstarted game ( development still in progress )

Early Access.about: Game bought while development is in progress ( and still is )

Wish from review.about: game with good notation from 'home made review' that are candidate to be bought

Errors.about: Try to detected what is missing

contents.title: #WISH and #DONE ( should set to PLATFORM/WISH and only #WISH tag )
#WISH and #NEXT ( should set to PLATFORM/WISH and only #WISH tag )
